mentions.context: CPN Tools [20], [21]) is used for editing CPN models.

The first transition, SelectProduct, allows users to choose the product they want to buy, while the second transition, Payment, allows the user to pay for his order, and the last transition, ConfirmOrder, allows the user  The CPN graph in figure 4   Do CompleteOrder When a business process is executed, it must respect a set of business rules.

We add a set of business rules, for example 1: BR1-R1: If (n ≤ 0) do not SelectProduct &PNO(n)&PNAME(name)&PPRICE(price) BR1-R2: If (name = "") do not ConfirmOrder&confirmOrder(success) We merge two sets of ECA rules into a single knowledge base.

In this example, two transitions valideCODInfo and valideCardInfo in the sub-model get control from the transition SelectProduct (in the main model) through the input port PriceOfProduct and send the control to transition ConfirmOrder (in the main model) through the output port at ConfirmPayment.
